attributes.action: The Courts or Parliament should not be able to Thwart the will off the people
attributes.background: The Courts or Parliament should not be able under any circumstances, as provided by the referendum on Brexit. The 17.4 million people won the referendum and the prime minister alone should be able to trigger the exit from the European UNion.

rejection.details: Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
